text:
Is there a better than a "global" try-catch to avoid server-errors leaking to the client in HTTP?
Example:
```julia> HTTP.listen("0.0.0.0", 8080) do http
           error("internal error that you are not supposed to see")
       end```
will return
```$ curl localhost:8080
internal error that you are not supposed to see```
